caller_intent: Angela Pearman seeks to add a vehicle to her existing commercial auto policy, noting the vehicle is already insured under her personal policy and that she previously emailed details to Anna.
resolution_steps: Gloria confirms Angela's business name (Pearman Sparkling Clean) and account details.
Gloria acknowledges the vehicle is already insured under Angela's personal policy and that prior information was emailed to Anna.
Gloria offers to send an email with required information or have Angela provide details directly, but Angela states information has already been shared.
Gloria assures Angela that the team will follow up and call back to proceed with the request.
knowledge_required: Handling requests for policy updates with existing customer data
summary: Angela Pearman requested assistance adding a vehicle to her commercial policy, noting prior communication with Anna. Gloria confirmed account details and assured follow-up. The call concluded with a promise to contact Angela for next steps.
